name: Lich Clicker
description:
Welcome to the Afterlife!


There is nothing like being dead and harvesting the souls of those who died before, around or even because of you.

In this deceptively simple game, collect souls and upgrade your magical prowess. But beware, for your choices matter! Will you find true love, or doom the world to your likening?

Five fully voiced endings and multiple story paths will guide you through this relaxing clicker game, featuring countless fully voiced lines by the Lich itself.
